post.body: 4srs! I can't wait to see the trollans of the final episode of Akane Iro, but it's nowhere to be found~
lol, are you freaking serious? that's just sad
But how the heck did you watch season 2 without watching season 1? I don't think I could do that D:
I like the Shana tags, lol. But wtf, you saw season 2 but not season 1?
And when I say crude, I mean graphically (lol 8-bit color). It's really more complicated than most of the stuff I did with C++
I'm coding a 'video game' program in assembly language. It's a rather crude version of a memory game (match one card to another)
If your math final has questions that easy, I wouldn't worry :p Though I approve of staying up to watch Toradora~
Churning out a post now. View at your own risk. RAEG awaits
When that happens to me, it usually means I can't stop until it's over. Like with True Tears, and H2O, and ef, and.. yeah
Haha, twitter is my only outlet during anime marathons. It's too long to type up a post :p
Oh yeah... uh, that was actually completely unintentional. Really. But wow that does work quite nicely, except it's too long~
I'm also a fan of the emotional sledgehammer, but I figured ef would probably hit more like a freight train~
Thanks for the recommendation, going to check that out
Yeah, that's what I'm afraid of :x ef is certainly not a series that holds back at all :p
Yeah, I might actually go for that, I think I have it all, I'm just avoiding it >_>
ugh, I'm going nocturnal again, need to lay off the warcrack for a few days I think~
Akane Iro does not disappoint. oh the lulz
Well, that was pretty sudden. Looks like our dog won't make it to Christmas after all :|
/bored
D: man I really burned my mouth eating those sloppy joes
sleepy sleepy sleepy~ (if you catch the reference, you win!)
This is why I hate programming... I can't stop until I'm done. Even if I'm writing a program that takes 1000+ lines of code
wow, I'm tired. Time to go to bed after an unexpectedly GOOD END to tonight~
I've never been so glad to be wrong! Or so glad to see a cliched end. Why? I don't know~
I really hope I'm not right again :|
I fucking hate when I'm right
oh god inb4 love triangle rage
Did my post for #11 of the 12 days of anime early today~
I've convened with myself and decided my next meal will be sola. What say you, twitter gods of anime?
ah, excellent, first post of 2009 comes with a cup of RAGE~
inb4 raeg and then sleep
geh
ef, you're evil. Getting me to fall in love with Yuuko even though I know there can't possibly be a happy ending. *shakes fist*
why must you tug at my heart like this, ef?!
yase... moar Chihiro is gewd :3
happy 2009 fellow east coasters~
Ugh, I think this was a bad choice after all. Going from Hayami getting beaten up to Yuuko getting beaten up really makes me RAGE HARD
Yus! more Chihiro = win :3
must not get attached... must not get attached... D:
*preparing to be run over by the emotional freight train named ef*
